channel.title: Argmax on Daker Pinheiro
channel.description: Recent content in Argmax on Daker Pinheiro

item.title: Python cookbook: argmin & argmax
item.description: def argmin(iter, function): return min((f(x), x) for x in iter)[1] def argmax(iter, function): return max((f(x), x) for x in iter)[1] >>> argmin(range(-100, 100), lambda x: x * x) 0 >>> argmax(range(-100, 100), lambda x: - x * x) 0 >>> argmax([[1, 2, 4], [1], [2, 5], []], len) [1, 2, 4]
